The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 08 October is 3,867 (447.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 04 October, there were 283 new confirmed cases (32.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 September, there were 187 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 51% (96 extra cases).
